comment: He seems like a nice guy, but his teaching was bad. He mumbled a lot and would get off topic. Sometimes it felt as though he didn't know what he was talking about. I felt like I would have done better teaching it to myself. I am now forced to retake the class, and I will not be doing so with him as my instructor.
HORRIBLE... You're completely on your own learning everything. Teacher does not know how to teach, and fails miserably. I got a 79 in this class and he would not round to a B.
He is the best. As long as you study his study guides, be sure to make an A.
He is one of the worst profesors at KSU, he is a very nice guy,however, you wornt learn anything from him. Teach yourself and use his study guides and you will do fine.

His class was hard, but he did have study guides for each and every test which was invaluable. He curved each exam to allow for maximum passing grades. The best thing to do if you're not economically inclined is to see him during his office hours. He is more than willing to go over the material and will give you a better grade if you do.
I feel bad giving him a poor rating because he seems like a nice man, but he should not be a teacher. He just doesn't just understand how to teach very affectively.

STAY AWAY! He is a nice person but a horrible teacher. He mumbles, does this weird thing with his hands, switches from one thing to another. He knows a lot but has a hard time teaching it. He teaches as if you already know the stuff or like he's talking to himself. The only way you will pass is if you use the study guide that he provides.

This guy should not be teaching. From his word for word power point readings, you would think this guy has no experience at all as an economist. I'm taking the corse again this semester, and I am looking forward to making an A.. I can literally recite all of this new professors lectures without and study.. Do not take if you are used to a useful pr

His teaching ability is subpar. However, he is somewhat helpful prior to the test if you have any particular questions. Additionally, he provides great study guides and doesn't use the book that much-can learn most from the handouts he puts together for each chapter. If you have the disciple to learn on your own, highly recommend.
As far as his teaching skills go he is basically useless.  Do not go to class and study on your own.  He will more than likely confuse you if you go
Professor Denaux is great!!!

He's not a very good teacher, if you take his class, its more self study than anything. He gives a little bit of extra credit and curves test grades a bit, but not a very easy class. He mumbles and isn't very clear not what he's talking about. I recommend taking someone else.

He is a really nice guy, but I guess teaching Economics is not the easiest class to teach. I think I taught myself more reading the text, then I did by going to his class. He gives alot of extra credit. Take him if you want a fairly easy "A" or "B". If you make a "C" in his class, stay as far away from Economics as possible.
He is very helpful!

He can be helpful does give you study guides, but tests are harder than expected. Is not very good at teaching. He needs better oral and communication skills. He seems to skip over important matters and focus on easy parts. Boring

He loses his train of thought, mumbles, does not know answers to simple questions. The study guide is the test, but the graphs and math portion are useless because he doesn't teach the material properly, so its impossible to study something you don't understand. He does replace the final grade for lowest test grade and gives out tests for the final
DONT TAKE HIM! you feel like taking his class is a waste of time. extremely boring. i rarely went to class because i would learn more from teaching myself from the text. useless
he gives you a study guide and everything on the guide is on the test
not a bad class he gives you a study guide.  Everything on the study guide is on the test.  Not a great teacher but pretty easy overall.

NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL!! Doesn't know what he is teaching. Mumbles A LOT sooo it very hard to understand what he is saying. Does weird hand gestures. Makes a fairly easy subject hard and very very boring.
